name: Puddle hero
description:
Special for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam #gmtkjam

It's you chance to play as a puddle. You have only one button to control - your left mouse button. You can move, fly, kill fire, jump, solve "puzzles", squeeze to progress the level and get health with only one button. 

Used frameworks and assets:

Unity3d

Anima2d

TextMeshPro 

Standart unity particles for inspiration.
